info.title: SaaS API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for the SaaS platform with authentication, user management, company management, and plan management.

post.description: Authenticate user and return access token
Logout user from all active sessions

get.description: Get paginated list of companies. Requires super-admin role.

post.description: Create a new company with admin user. Disponible sin autenticaci√≥n.

get.description: Get a specific company by ID. Available to all authenticated users.

put.description: Update a specific company. Available to all authenticated users.

delete.description: Delete a specific company. Available to all authenticated users.

post.description: Change the subscription plan for a company. Available to all authenticated users.

get.description: Get paginated list of plans. Requires super-admin role.

post.description: Create a new plan. Requires super-admin role.

get.description: Get a specific plan by ID. Requires super-admin role.

put.description: Update a specific plan. Requires super-admin role.

delete.description: Soft delete a specific plan. Requires super-admin role.

patch.description: Restore a soft deleted plan. Requires super-admin role.

get.description: Get paginated list of users. Requires super-admin or admin role.

post.description: Create a new user. Requires super-admin or admin role.

get.description: Get a specific user by ID. Requires super-admin or admin role.

put.description: Update a specific user. Requires super-admin or admin role.

delete.description: Soft delete a specific user. Requires super-admin or admin role.

patch.description: Restore a soft deleted user. Requires super-admin or admin role.

bearerAuth.description: Enter the token without the 'Bearer ' prefix
